ComicInfo.Summary:
With one of their own dead at the hands of one Harada's Eggbreakers, things are getting desperate for the team when the Harbinger Foundation tracks the team to their base of operations. But it'll take more than that to keep the H.A.R.D. Corps down as the team goes on an unauthorized excursion to get payback for Maniac!
The psi-borg soldiers of the H.A.R.D. Corps are made to retreat from their embattled base by Harbinger forces. Later, the psi-borgs finally have time to mourn their fallen comrade, Maniac. Drunk and vengeful, Gunslinger and the others go AWOL to kill Big Boy. Denied their powers, the psi-borgs fight a losing battle until Softcore grudgingly grants them Shield power, which Shakespeare uses on Big Boy with a shockingly fatal effect!
